npcs.name: Agamennus
utterances: Yes, hail to you as well.  Let's just skip the pretend friendship part and get down to business shall we?

npcs.name: Aldrevia Metilla
utterances: Oh, hello there.  Have a seat and make yourself comfortable.

npcs.name: Alexandria Tal`Azroth
utterances: Hello. It's nice to meet you, stranger. I've been waiting for news of my brother. I haven't heard from him in a very long time and I fear the worst.

npcs.name: Amandio Sepunius
utterances: Knowing the right people will keep you safe in this city.  You aren't one of them.
If you're looking for trouble, I've got a whole fistful of it waiting for you.
You're lucky there are witnesses watching us right now.

npcs.name: Annia Kaeso
utterances: Hello.  Hello.  Welcome.  You look out of place here in Freeport.  Almost as if you were something blown in by the wind or swept ashore by the tide.  No wait.  It was that dream!

npcs.name: Apollonia Vibenius
utterances: You'd be a lot more interesting with a dagger sticking out of your back.

npcs.name: Bassam
utterances: My time is too valuable to be spent chatting.
Salutations, dark one.
Greetings.  One day I hope everyone bows before my intellect.

npcs.name: Caius Brucci
utterances: Fair weather and prosperous harvest to you.  What might I interest you in today?

npcs.name: Caraw Slivermoon
utterances: How could you stand living underground for so long?
Can you see the beauty of the open plains?

npcs.name: Clara Maius
utterances: I've no need for you.

npcs.name: Clodia Laeca
utterances: If you need supplies, you best get 'em now! My wares go quickly. Hurry over, traveler. You mustn't wait! Come now!

npcs.name: Crilt Browbeat
utterances: I've lived this long thanks to my ability to kill.
The best dreams are the flashbacks of the battlefield.

npcs.name: Diometria Oppius
utterances: I'd rather be stranded overboard than be converted by the dark beliefs that Dismal Rage preaches.
The Seafury Buccaneers are feared by all others on the open sea. They show no mercy to the dogs that try to sail the sea unprotected.

npcs.name: Elona Shawnasy
utterances: Fingers make a tasty treat.  Yours are looking pretty ripe.
I wonder how fast you can run with one leg.
No, I didn't say you could look at me or talk to me for that matter.
All those rumors about the people I decapitated are false, trust me. I decapitated many more by my count.
Did you just speak to me?  You're braver than most.

npcs.name: Ghadah
utterances: I doubt there is anyone in this city more intelligent than myself.
The mindless babbling of a simpleton delights me to no end.

npcs.name: Glycon Duronius
utterances: No, no, no!!!  That will never work!  The person still needs to breathe, don't they?  Don't they?
So far, I have found kerrans to have only one life, not nine.  I insist on finding the other eight!
I will prove to them that I'm not mad!  If I have to kill everyone of them to prove it, I will!

npcs.name: Haggler Verinus
utterances: Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!
The stuff's over there.  Just let me know if you find anything you like.

npcs.name: Hrenga Heartcrush
utterances: Overlord is the strongest troll ever!  He kill twenty of us troll last week.  Wow!

npcs.name: Jetsam Anchorwash
utterances: Eh?  What?  Get your dog breath out of my face and leave me to my ale!

npcs.name: Lathergust
utterances: I'm a complete failure.  I'll never get that vegetation experiment to work right!

npcs.name: Lavic N'Gam
utterances: Yeah, you struck me as gutter trash.  Listen closely, for I don't plan on repeating myself: I have several assignments right now, but I don't have the time to take care of them all.  This is where you come in.

I just told you, you fool!  I need a meat bag to get out there and do the clumsy work while I'm doing the important parts.  You're already beginning to irritate me, trash.  Do you want to see some action or not? I'm sure I can find other refuse around here willing to work for me.

The assignment requires you to do some foot work, and if you're lucky, a little more.  Judging by the way you look, I doubt this is too much to ask of you.  But, if you do return, I'll pay you.  Now, are you in or not?

npcs.name: Lucilla Quietus
utterances: Either buy something or get out of the way!

npcs.name: Mac Windstreaker
utterances: Hah! New around these parts?
Watch yerself, this city can be rough.

npcs.name: Nipius Malchus
utterances: Hail to you as well.  Forgive me if we've met before...  I'm a little distracted.  I've more custom orders for armor then I've the tradesmen to match.

npcs.name: Pamoja
utterances: I can smell a champion, and you're no champion.
Some say that Kerra are  sneaky, evil, and cruel.  True and we have many other fine qualities as well.
Everything has a price!  What's yours?
I am a kindly master, just so long as you remember your place.
Why, don't I seem to be the popular one today.

npcs.name: Pavel
utterances: I am in no way interested in that glittery thing you have.  I promise.
I know where I've been, cause I'm always watching my back.
Never cheat an ogre, unless you're sure you can get away with it.
Do you ever get the feeling someone is watching you?
Are you threatening me?

npcs.name: Sasha
utterances: I didn't steal that, besides it didn't even fit.
Never ask when you can just take.
It's not true that the kerra always land on their feet.

npcs.name: Sergeant Nominus
utterances: Hail, citizen.  If you have something to report then speak up.  Otherwise, move along.

npcs.name: Sidonius Baro
utterances: Let me guess, your looking for poison right?
Poison testers, it's been my biggest seller for the past several months.  Of course poison was a close second.

npcs.name: Taba Curhunter
utterances: If I found the smallest piece of magical residue in the world and cut it in half, I wonder what would happen?
Only an amateur would bother worrying about ethics!

npcs.name: Urak Eyegouge
utterances: Me have many pieces of rat fur.  I is richest troll ever.
If I eats you now, I wouldn't know what you were going to say.
The Overlord needs to let trolls eat more people.  He won't miss them.

npcs.name: Valokis
utterances: In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.
Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!
Are you going to buy anything today or am I just wasting my time?  This isn't a museum display you know!

npcs.name: Vlenka Nightstalker
utterances: I refuse to be told what to do by a group of simple-minded buffoons!
Poisoning is always an effective way of winning a debate.
Do you honestly believe I would speak with someone like you?

npcs.name: Voula Redeye
utterances: I can hear breaking bones from many cogs away.
I travel. As long as its to inflict pain.
Armor is just an extension of my skin.
